text:
Dr. Jeff Levin-Scherz and Ben Lupin from @WTWcorporate answer timely questions, including: Can employers purchase vaccines? Or require employees to be vaccinated?HR questions on #COVID19 #vaccine policies. via @hrexecmag #employeebenefits #wellness
